Trustee_4_pre_2.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_2.content: My reputation as a trustee has been significantly enhanced through my fair and responsible behavior during the investment process. By proposing a generous allocation plan that prioritized the investor's share at 70%, I exemplified trustworthiness and pro-sociality, fostering mutual benefit. The successful investment outcome and adherence to the distribution plan further solidified my reliability and competence, thus reinforcing my reputation as a trustworthy and effective trustee.
